db_wizard_header_step1.label: Welcome to the Database Setup Wizard

db_wizard_lbl_keys2.label: MDN uses keys to uniquely identify records. If no keys have been set for an entity within a Database then MDN is forced to include all fields to identify the record. As views frequently only display one or two fields in an entity this can reduce performance because MDN needs to process many unnecessary fields.

db_wizard_lbl_keys3.label: To set key fields finish this wizard then select the desired key field in the tree and press the Set Key button to make the field a key field. The icon for the field will change to indicate that it is a key. Repeat this process with additional fields if the entity has a composite key. The keys selected in MDN should match those in the source database.

db_wizard_lbl_import.label: This option allows you to import a new Database. The wizard will prompt you to enter details regarding the new Database allowing MDN to import Tables and Columns from that Database. You are also able to create a new Database and choose not to import Tables and Columns by clicking finish at the Database Properties screen.

db_wizard_lbl_update.label: This option allows you to import (or update) an existing Database by importing Tables and Columns.
